title: News24.com | SA honeymooning couple stuck in luxury Maldives hotel amid coronavirus lockdown
description: What was meant to be a six-day honeymoon on a tropical island soon turned into an isolation destination for these South African newlyweds.
content:
What was meant to be a six-day honeymoon on a tropical island soon turned into an isolation destination for these South African newlyweds.
The De Freitases - Olivia, 27, and Raul, 28 - from South Africa arrived at the beautiful Cinnamon Velifushi Hotel in th… [+2065 chars]
